contentrichtext.text: {{Wiktionary|marsh}} A '''[[marsh]]''' is a type of wetland. '''Marsh''' may also refer to: {{TOCright}} == Medicine == * Marsh Classification scheme for intestinal pathology in [[coeliac disease]] == Places == ;Australia: * [[Bacchus Marsh, Victoria]] ;England: * [[Marsh, Buckinghamshire]] * [[Marsh, West Yorkshire]] * [[Marsh Baldon]], [[Oxfordshire]] * [[Marsh Gibbon]], [[Buckinghamshire]] * [[Marsh Green, Devon]] * [[Marsh Green, Kent]] * [[Marsh Lane, Derbyshire]] * [[Marsh Lane, Gloucestershire]] ;United States: * Marsh, former name of [[Avon, Contra Costa County, California]] * [[Marsh Township, Barnes County, North Dakota]] == Companies == * [[Marsh Insurance Broker]], an insurance broker and strategic risk advisor * [[Marsh Supermarkets]], a supermarket chain based in Indianapolis, Indiana * [[Marsh Aviation]], American aerospace company * [[Marsh & McLennan Companies]] is a U.S.-based global professional services firm == Other uses == * [[Marsh (surname)]] * [[Marsh River]], river in Minnesota, United States == See also== * [[Marsh Island (disambiguation)]] * [[Marsh Lake (disambiguation)]] * [[Marsh Lock]], lock and weir on the River Thames, England {{disambiguation|geo}}
